message.body: Hey let's pretend today is the 23rd because in my mind it was all day haha. Happy birthday!
Hahaha thanks Kellee!
How have you been!?
Ughh busyyyyyyy but good. How have you been? How was your birthday? That's today and not yesterday
Lol it was good. Went karaoke
That's good. Sounds like fun. How have you been besides just on your birthday
Same old stuff lol
Yeah. Why as children do we look at adults and think it's going to be awesome to be one because my life is the same boring, stressful crap every day
Who knows lol kids are dumb
But we were the dumb kids!
Yeah lol nothing we can do about that except laugh at the dumb kids now
Yeah I guess lol. It is kind of satisfying to hear how naive they are
Lol you're crazy
I was going to say something but now I want to tell you that I was typing the word brought and my auto correct took it upon itself to assume that I was typing the word brouhaha?
Hahahaha brouhaha
Lol I don't know what auto correct is thinking sometimes

Hey so I'm just going to cut to the chase, I need 3 personal and 3 professional references for a job and I clearly need them to be people I know are intelligent and won't sound like dumbasses if called so I was wondering if you want to be a personal reference since you have the 2 qualities I am looking for
Hahahaha references for what?

Medical assistant job can't tell you the place yet because technically I'm still in school but it's one of the requirements in the nursing program to have your resume, references, and cover letter ready prior to graduation
Sure. Lol what do I have to write? Just your character and stuff and how I don't think you'd kill anyone? Lol
Haha you don't have to do anything unless you get a call then you just say nice things about me and don't talk about how clumsy I am and yeah I guess add in how you don't think I'd kill anybody.
Ohhh it's a phone reference. Lol I got you.
I will defintely leave out the clumsiness lol
Haha thanks. I'm trying to make the clumsiness an on the job surprise
Hahaha good idea
